## LinkedList.append() method

Moves all elements from `other` to the end of the list.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
append(other: LinkedList<T>): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | [LinkedList](./calcium.linkedlist.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | Other linked list to append. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
